short_summary: Fourniture d'un chariot à fourche tout terrain
description: La Gendarmerie royale du Canada a besoin d'un chariot à fourche tout terrain au garage de poste (Chilliwack, C. B.) pour déplacer les véhicules qui ne fonctionnent pas.
full_summary:
---

# Supply of a Rough Terrain Forklift
## Mandatory Requirements

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to supply one (1) Rough Terrain Forklift for use at the Post Garage (Chilliwack, B.C.). The Contractor must deliver all deliverables by March 29, 2024.

## Evaluation Criteria

Bid submissions will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price.

## Tender Submission

To submit a bid, please send your proposal to E_Pacific_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca, referencing solicitation number M2989-3-0229. Late submissions will not be considered.

## Program Requirements

The contractor must ensure compliance with the terms and conditions outlined in the bid solicitation, including adherence to all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Important Documents

Please view the attached tender documents for additional information.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact Amy Wang at:
Amy.Wang@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
(236) 330-3559

## Business Number

Canada will only respond to businesses that have registered for a Business Number.

## Trade Agreements

Canada is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others. Contractor must comply with all obligations under these agreements.

## Indigenous Procurement

Contractor is invited to register in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory to increase visibility and gain additional business opportunities.

## Bidding Process

Bid submission must be made in one of Canada's official languages. Canada is not responsible for the accuracy of bidder-provided information.

## Contracting Terms

Contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest evaluated price.
